author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great Microtechnic!
review:
This set has all it takes to make a beginner understand what LEGO Technic is all about and is both technically and visually pleasing.
The best microtechnic I have. Both model have excellent play value (ask my son!) and are nice to display also.
Has a few spare parts too. Propellor rotates with wheels.
The alternate model is a helicopter, also with rotor connected to the wheels.
I bought two to have one of each model on display.
